title: Into the Woods by Erik Storstein
author: Erik Storstein

Issue 59 – August 2011Cover ArtInto the WoodsErik Storstein is a Norwegian digital-painter currently based in England where he studies hand-drawn animation. His works are mainly within the science-fiction and fantasy genres.
